title: A font to use with Lyon Text?
content:
Hi guys,  
I am doing a Literary Magazine, most probably with Lyon Text Font.  
 [http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/lyon/lyon\_text](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720165135/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/lyon/lyon_text "http://commercialtype.com/typefaces/lyon/lyon\_text")

Lyon will be used for Body Text.  
Can you suggest which font can be used with? for headlines, subheads, notes, etc.

Thanks and Best,  
S
author: uzapucax

comments.content: Lyon text has a high x height and short descenders and is a modern interpretation of a French oldstyle font. I would think either Whitney or Caspari would work well with this. Of the two, Caspari looks like a better match. The lower case "g" in Lyon text is hard to match.
Very interesting options here! thanks for the good info all variants looks good.
